title: 110_hr2094
content: Amends the Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2000 to revise the administrative authorities of the Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Commission. Authorizes the Commission to: (1) enter into contracts for specialized or professional services without regard to certain civil service requirements, (2) accept gifts of real or personal property, (3) appoint an architect. (4) hire and fire staff without regard to competitive service requirements and obtain temporary, intermittent, and part-time services. (5) enter into cooperative agreements with other government and private entities. And (6) accept volunteer services. Requires the Commission to: (1) appoint an Executive Director. And (2) obtain adminstrative and support services from the General Services Administration. Authorizes appropriations.
